about.title: About Me
summary: AI Engineering Intern at Taiwan Mobile and Master's student in Information Management at National Central University.
Specialized in NLP, Deep Learning, and Traditional Chinese AI models, awarded TANet Best Paper and GenAI Stars.
Passionate about transforming academic research into practical business solutions and advancing Taiwan's AI open-source ecosystem.
